attacks.name: Spiral Growth
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to Gyarados Star.

attacks.name: All-out Blast
attacks.effect: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you have 1 card left. This attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card you discarded in this way.
